portfolio.title: OrganiPro Consulting
portfolio.description: Branding, website and marketing for a consulting firm
portfolio.notes: A comprehensive branding and strategic actions for a consulting firm launching itself in the Moroccan market. The project includes branding design, a modern website, SEO optimization, and marketing strategies as well as content to enhance online presence and conversion of leads into clients.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.notes: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Features animated components, contact form integration with EmailJS, and smooth navigation.

portfolio.title: Dreamers: Creative Events and Media Agency
portfolio.description: Project management for creative events and media production
portfolio.notes: Led project management for a creative agency specializing in events and media production. Managed website development, coordinated photoshoots and video productions, led creative teams, and negotiated with suppliers to maintain budget efficiency.

portfolio.title: Tadoud : A Cultural E-Commerce Platform
portfolio.notes: Complete e-commerce platform with shopping cart, payment integration, user authentication, and admin dashboard. Built with modern web technologies for optimal performance.
